user.title: Connect to Oma Helen
user.description: Enter your Oma Helen credentials to monitor your electricity consumption and costs

data_description.contract_type: Choose your contract type. Select 'Automatic' to detect it automatically, or choose manually if automatic detection fails.
data_description.default_unit_price: Set the unit price if you want to override Helen's price
data_description.default_base_price: Set the base price if you want to override Helen's base price
data_description.delivery_site_id: If you have multiple delivery sites, enter the ID of the site you want to monitor
data_description.include_transfer_costs: Select if you want to monitor electricity transfer costs as well

reauth_confirm.title: New Oma Helen authentication
reauth_confirm.description: Enter your password again to authenticate to Oma Helen

error.cannot_connect: Connection to Oma Helen failed. Check your internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, the service may be temporarily unavailable.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Check your credentials and try again.
error.invalid_delivery_site_id: Invalid delivery site ID. Check that the ID exists.
error.contract_type_not_detected: Contract type could not be detected. Please select your contract type manually.
error.contract_type_not_resolved: The contract type '{contract_type}' could not be reliably resolved. Please select your contract type manually.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.
